entry.title: Mutual information Maximization By Incorporating Global and Local Feature

link.title: Mutual information Maximization By Incorporating Global and Local Feature

entry.summary: ICLR 2019 Oral Paper Learning deep representations by mutual information estimation and maximization Summary It has been a consensus that a perfect representation of high dimensional data should maximize mutual information between the input and the output. Suppose $X$ is a high dimensional input, e.g an image, and $Y=E_{\phi}(X)$ is its low dimension representation, then $I(X;Y)$ should reach...

entry.title: Build blog with Github Pages and Jekyll

link.title: Build blog with Github Pages and Jekyll

entry.summary: Jekyll this blog was bulit with jekyll. To install jekyll, some prerequisites should be satisfyied, for ubuntu platform, simply run the following commands to install. sudo apt-get install ruby-full build-essential zlib1g-dev and change the bash profile so that ruby gem knows where to find himself echo '# Install Ruby Gems to ~/gems' >> ~/.bashrc echo 'export GEM_HOME="$HOME/gems"' &g...
